maqras.text: Cun osmon sikofta savad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
va cun zamin munʙasit (kasida va pahd) savad
va har ciro ki dar darun dorad, ʙerun partojad va xoli gardad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
Ej inson, tu dar rohi Parvardigorat ranci farovon mekasi, pas mukofoti onro xohi did
Har kas, ki nomaasro ʙa dasti rostas dihand
ʙa zudi oson az u hisoʙ kunand
va sodmon nazdi kasonas ʙozgardad
Ammo har kas, ki nomaas az pusti sar doda savad
ʙa zudi, ki ʙigujad: «Voj ʙar man, ki halok sudam»
Va ʙa otasi afruxta darojad
U dar dunjo nazdi kasonas sodmon zista ʙud
Va mepindost, ki hargiz ʙoznaxohad gast
Ore, Parvardigoras uro medidaast
Pas ʙa safaq savgand mexuram
va savgand ʙa saʙu har ciro furu pusad
va savgand ʙa moh, cun purra savad
ki ʙa hole ʙa'd az holi digar xohed rasid
Ci mesavad onhoro, ki imon nameovarand
Va cun Qur'on ʙar onho xonda savad, sacda namekunand? (Sacda)
Balki kofiron takziʙ mekunand (duruƣ meʙarorand)
Va Xudo ʙa on ci dar dil dorand, ogoh ast
Pas ononro ʙa azoʙe dardovar xusxaʙar deh
ƣajri onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ki mukofotasonro pojone nest
Qasam ʙa osmon, ki dorandai ʙurchost
va qasam ʙa ruzi mav'ud
va qasam ʙa sohididihanda va on ci ʙa on sohidi dihand
ki sohiʙoni uhdud ʙa halokat rasidand
Otase afruxta az hezumho
on goh ki ʙar kanori on otas nisasta ʙudand
va ʙar on ci ʙar sari mu'minon meovarand, sohid ʙudand
Va hec ajʙe dar onho najoftand, cuz on ki ʙa Xudoi ƣoliʙi loiqi sitois imon ovarda ʙudand
on Xudoe, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va ʙar har cize nozir ast
Alʙatta onon, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca kardand va tavʙa nakardand, azoʙi cahannam va azoʙi otas ʙaroi onhost
Baroi kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙihisthoest, ki dar on nahrho corist va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest
Ba azoʙ giriftani Parvardigori tu saxt ast
Ust, ki naxust meofarinad va pas az marg zinda mesozad
U ʙaxsojandavu dustdoranda ast
Ust sohiʙi arsi ʙuzurg
Har ciro iroda kunad, ʙa ancom merasonad
Ojo dostoni laskarhoro sunidai
Laskarhoi Fir'avnu qavmi Samud
Ore, onon, ki rohi kufr pes giriftaand, hamcunon dar duruƣʙarori hastand
va Xudo az hama su ʙar onho ihota dorad
Bale, in Qur'oni macid ast
dar lavhi mahfuz
Savgand ʙa osmonu ʙa on ci dar saʙ ojad
Va tu ci doni, ki on ci dar saʙ ojad, cist
Sitoraest duraxsanda
Hec kas nest, ki ʙar u nigahʙone naʙosad
Pas odami ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarisa sudaast
Az oʙe cahanda ofarida sudaast
ki az mijoni pustu sina ʙerun meojad
Xudo ʙa ʙozgardonidani u tavonost
ruze, ki rozho (sirho) oskor mesavand
Uro na quvvatest, va na jovare
Qasam ʙa osmoni ʙozʙoranda
Qasam ʙa zamini rujoni sikofxurda, (ʙaroi gijoh)
ki in kitoʙ haqro az ʙotil cudo kunad
va suxani hazl nest
Onon hilae meandesand
va Man ham hilae meandesam
Pas kofironro muhlat deh andak muhlatason deh
